description: Known malicious npm packages compiled from security advisories and incident reports.

packages.name: event-stream
packages.reason: Contained malicious code targeting Copay bitcoin wallet. The flatmap-stream dependency was compromised.

packages.name: flatmap-stream
packages.reason: Injected malicious code into event-stream to steal cryptocurrency.

packages.name: ua-parser-js
packages.reason: Compromised versions contained crypto mining and password stealing malware.

packages.name: coa
packages.reason: Compromised with malware that steals passwords.

packages.name: rc
packages.reason: Compromised with malware similar to coa attack.

packages.name: crossenv
packages.reason: Typosquat of cross-env. Steals environment variables including npm tokens.

packages.name: cross-env.js
packages.reason: Typosquat of cross-env. Steals environment variables.

packages.name: babelcli
packages.reason: Typosquat of babel-cli. Malicious package.

packages.name: eslint-scope
packages.reason: Compromised to steal npm credentials.

packages.name: getcookies
packages.reason: Steals cookies and sends them to attacker-controlled server.

packages.name: discord-selfbot-v14
packages.reason: Steals Discord tokens and system information.

packages.name: discord-badge
packages.reason: Steals Discord tokens.

packages.name: colors
packages.reason: Developer intentionally corrupted package with infinite loop as protest.

packages.name: faker
packages.reason: Developer intentionally corrupted package as protest.

packages.name: node-ipc
packages.reason: Developer added code that would delete files on Russian/Belarusian systems (protestware).

packages.name: peacenotwar
packages.reason: Dependency used by node-ipc to deliver protestware.

packages.name: @pnpm/exe
packages.reason: Typosquat targeting pnpm users, contains malware.

packages.name: eslint-config-prettier-plugin
packages.reason: Typosquat of eslint-config-prettier, contains malware.

packages.name: jdb
packages.reason: Contains hidden cryptocurrency miner.

packages.name: db-json
packages.reason: Contains hidden cryptocurrency miner.

packages.name: nodemailer-js
packages.reason: Typosquat of nodemailer containing backdoor.

packages.name: nodemailer-js-utils
packages.reason: Fake package containing backdoor.

packages.name: http-fetch-cookies
packages.reason: Contains reverse shell backdoor.

packages.name: twilio-npm
packages.reason: Typosquat of twilio, contains malware.

packages.name: lodash-es
packages.reason: Malicious version uploaded briefly, not from original maintainer.

packages.name: lemaaa
packages.reason: Contains token grabber and data exfiltration code.

packages.name: internal-store
packages.reason: Dependency confusion attack targeting internal packages.

packages.name: socketio
packages.reason: Typosquat of socket.io. Contains data-stealing malware.

packages.name: d3.js
packages.reason: Typosquat of d3. Malicious package.

packages.name: mongose
packages.reason: Typosquat of mongoose. Malicious package.

packages.name: mssql-node
packages.reason: Fake database connector with backdoor.

packages.name: require-port
packages.reason: Typosquat of portfinder/require-port, contains malware.

packages.name: azure-identity-js
packages.reason: Typosquat of @azure/identity, contains credential stealer.

packages.name: aws-sdk-js
packages.reason: Typosquat of aws-sdk, contains credential stealer.
